_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Form of the past is suffering
Form of the future is suffering
Form of the present is suffering
The practice of a learned noble disciple: Doesn’t look forward to enjoying future form
Practices for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding present form
The three times of suffering (continued): Consciousness of the past is suffering
Consciousness of the future is suffering
Consciousness of the present is suffering
The practice of a learned noble disciple: Doesn’t look forward to enjoying future consciousness
Practices for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding present consciousness
